p: The MRAFO oil purchased was supplemented with 1,000 ppm (1.00 g.kg −1) of the antioxidant product Fortium ® brand MT70 IP liquid, which contained a mixture of α-, β-, γ- and δ-tocopherols [8–14%, 0.5–2%, 43–49% and 11–18% (w/w) respectively] in sunflower oil (the latter serving as a further, but low level source of the 1H NMR-detectable PUFAs detectable in this oil).
